title: Zucchini Tomato Pie
description: Zucchini, tomato, and onion combine with Parmesan cheese and baking mix, like Bisquick, to make this pie recipe a snap to throw together on a summer day.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Coat a 10-inch pie plate with cooking spray.
Combine zucchini, tomato, onion, and Parmesan cheese in the prepared pie plate.
Beat baking mix, eggs, milk, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl until smooth; pour over zucchini mixture.
Bake in the preheated oven until a knife inserted into center comes out clean, about 30 minutes.
author: [{'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'VEGAS'}]

featured_tweaks.text: I followed the other suggestions and ramped up the flavor with Italian herbs and garlic. I increased the parmesan cheese and made it a meal with protein by pre-cooking in a skillet, 1/2 italian ground sausage and 1/2 lean hamburger. I sauteed the onions until carmelized and also cooked the zucchini and tomatoes separately in skillets and drained well befre mixing. I also had some pizza dough on hand so I weaved a top crust to give it some crunch and add to the presentation.

reviews.text: I followed the other suggestions and ramped up the flavor with Italian herbs and garlic. I increased the parmesan cheese and made it a meal with protein by pre-cooking in a skillet, 1/2 italian ground sausage and 1/2 lean hamburger. I sauteed the onions until carmelized and also cooked the zucchini and tomatoes separately in skillets and drained well befre mixing. I also had some pizza dough on hand so I weaved a top crust to give it some crunch and add to the presentation.

I followed Robbin818 suggestions to sauté the veggies and adjust the bisquick recipe and then seasoned the veggies with salt, pepper and seasoning before putting them in the pie pan. I also added a little Parmesan cheese to the bisquick mix. It’s amazing! I won’t be having trouble using up the zucchini this summer!
Awesome dish and easy to make. Did use a seasoned salt. Would make again!
I made this but added some fresh herbs like Basil and oregano and cheddar cheese and it was delicious!!
